channel.title: Hollyshorts on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Celia Imrie, Penelope Wilton, Catherine Hardwicke, Jake Lacy Join HollyShorts Film Fest Jury (Exclusive)
item.description: Jennifer Ehle (‘Pride and Prejudice’), Anthony Head (‘Buffy the Vampire Slayer’) and Essie Davis (‘The Babadook’) are also among the all-star jury lineup.
